name: Experiment 52
description:
Videogame inspired in horror games like Silent Hill, developed during #Devtober.

Prologue:

The subjects are forced to perform experiments in differents rooms, exposed to differents environments with different puzzles in each room, the objective is finish the proofs and get all the keys.

Three rooms with different puzzles.

Controls.

Movement :  W A S D or Arrows

Interaction:  E

Pause:  ESC

You can see the process here:

https://twitter.com/i/moments/1054598013463588864

Credits:

Concept, Graphics,  Gameplay and Developing by Javier Rubio (Azdepredador)

Music by Joth and Juani Junkala

Treeman by Russell Ballestrini
